function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mayor contacto frecuente entre miembros de la familia","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission within the family","Mitigation":"Encourage vaccination, promote good hygiene practices, and use personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote healthcare monitoring","People":"Family members","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Preservación de la calidad del aire al evitar desplazamientos al lugar de trabajo","Impact":"Reduced exposure to outdoor pollutants, but increased exposure to indoor pollutants","Mitigation":"Improve indoor air quality through ventilation, filtration, and air purifiers","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, smart HVAC systems","People":"Telecommuters","Owner":"Employers, building managers, environmental health agencies"},{"Description":"Exigencia de mayor conocimiento computacional para el teletrabajo","Impact":"Potential increase in sedentary behavior and prolonged screen time, leading to physical and mental health issues","Mitigation":"Provide ergonomic workstations, encourage regular breaks and physical activity, offer mental health support","Technologies":"Ergonomic furniture, standing desks, screen time monitoring tools","People":"Telecommuters","Owner":"Employers, occupational health and safety professionals"}]}
